post.description:
Handles file uploads and processes them using the IngestionService.
This is the new MPA-based endpoint for file ingestion.
**Requires DATA_SCIENTIST role.**

with the given session_id.

post.description:
Secure proxy endpoint to interact with the Gemini API.
The API key is handled on the server-side.

get.description: Returns the status of all jobs.

Generates and downloads the specified report for a completed job.
Currently, only PDF format is supported.
Returns the target.json file for the specified job from the StateStore.
Returns the quality_report.json file for the specified job from the StateStore.
Returns the status of the AutoML module, including the number of registered models.

Submits a new AutoML job.

job_id.title: Job Id
job_id.description: The job_id of the main analysis pipeline to link with.

target.title: Target
target.description: The target variable for supervised learning. If None, it's inferred from the target detection step.

models_to_run.title: Models To Run
models_to_run.description: Optional list of model keys to run. If None, a default selection is used.

job_id.title: Job Id
job_id.description: The job_id of the main analysis pipeline to link with.

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: The name of the model to optimize.

n_trials.title: N Trials
n_trials.description: The number of HPO trials to run.

scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.description: The scoring metric to optimize for.

SessionRequest.title: SessionRequest
SessionRequest.description: Defines the standard request model for session-based operations.
